column4: Hi all, i've just upgrade to hardy and the new kernel recognises my on board ethernet - bizarrely though i can't connect to my network over static OR dhcp - if i
change back to the old kernel it works fine - i've got up to date -restricted -modules and even -backports packages according to apt - can anyone help shed any
try it under a hardy live cd.  if it works there, then there's some previous configuration from before the upgrade that's messing it up
they're particular to the partitions iirc
